name: smart-media-library-manager
description: Smart Media Library Manager - A local media server similar to Plex/Emby

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev -- --port 4000 --hostname 0.0.0.0"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start -- -p 4000 -H 0.0.0.0"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Smart Media Library Manager
